rightcol.p: There is a mailing list for discussions about xindy, proposals, and other interesting stuff. Tell us your experiences and bring your ideas into this project!

Subscription is possible on
this Web page.
You will receive an email that asks for confirmation of your subscription, to combat spam.
Address of the mailing list itself, for contributions, is
You need to be subscribed to send email; the spam problem forces us to use this configuration.

Starting in August 2004, a
mailing list archive is available.
Emails from 1997 to 2000 are available in a historic mail archive. No archive exists for emails from August 2000 to August 2004.
